resources.string: Please, provide the total kms of the vehicle in the input below, and press \"Proceed\".
This app will help you manage your vehicle\'s periodic maintenance.\nTo continue, select one of the options below.
Select the spare part you wish to update, provide the data that you want to update, and press \"Proceed\".
Select the spare part you wish to delete, and press \"Proceed\".
Provide the data below and press \"Proceed\".
Select the date. Defaults to today.

Thank you for using ServiceApp.

This app intends to help you simplify and automate the management of the periodic maintenance of your vehicle.

The app was designed to be simple, easy and straightforward. It comes with a pre-populated database of the most common spare parts. You must update these initial entries, according to your vehicle specs. Moreover, you can easily add or remove entries, to suit your specific needs.

For suggestions or bugs, please visit the project's GitHub url:
https://github.com/Vaggos/ServiceApp_Android

For questions or anything else, you can email me at the email provided below.

If you find this app useful, consider taking a quick read of the "Donate" portion of the app, by clicking the "Donate" button below.

Author: Vagelis Prokopiou.
Email: drz4007@gmail.com

This app has been kept clean from annoying advertisements.

Furthermore, all the features that may be added to future versions (according to the feedback that I will receive), will be available for all, for free. There will not be a "Lite" and a paid "Pro" version. This project is free and open source.

If you find this app useful and want to give back, to help further development, or you are appreciative and want to support open source, you can donate (code or money). For more info, please visit the project's GitHub url:
https://github.com/Vaggos/ServiceApp_Android

Either way, enjoy ServiceApp!
